title: On-Call Occupational Therapist
status: On-Call/As NeededMinimum Requirements:A Bachelor’s Degree from a four-year college or university in Occupational Therapy and initial board certification from the National Board for Certification in Occupational Therapy (NBCOT).An Active Utah Occupational Therapist License.The salary for this position is assigned to lane 5 of the EP Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkEP Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Occupational Therapist.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
